DisplayName.value: Buy On Day One - Parts and Mods for Bdub's Vehicles 2.0 - No Mechanic version

Description.value: All vehicle parts and vehicle mods from the Bdub's Vehicles 2.0 mod can be purchased from traders on day one. Use with worlds that DO NOT HAVE the Mechanic Trader POI See the readme.md file for more information. Compatible with version 2.0.0.5
